繈字的基本解释

繈
qiǎng
同“繦”。

繈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiǎng］
［《廣韻》居兩切，上養，見。］
亦作“繈1”。
(1)绳索。特指穿钱的绳索。亦指穿好绳的钱贯。
(2)通“襁”。背小儿用的布带。参见“繦緥”。

繈字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　繈； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页937第10
【唐韻】居兩切【集韻】【類篇】【韻會】舉兩切【正韻】居仰切，?音繈。【說文】捔類也。　又【玉篇】錢貫也。【前漢·食貨志】臧繈千萬。【廣韻】俗作鏹。　又【集韻】與襁同。【史記·衞將軍傳】靑子在繈褓中。【註】繈長尺二寸，闊八寸，以約小兒于背也。　又【廣韻】繈絲有纇。

繈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
繈字的起名意思

暂无。

swaddling clothes
Basic explanation of words
swaddling clothes
qiǎng
Same as "Xin".
swaddling clothes
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiǎng］
["Guangyun" has two cuts, the upper one, see you. ]
Also known as "swaddled 1".
(1) Rope. Especially the rope that wears money. It also refers to a money pipe that is well-worn.
(2) Through "waddling". A cloth belt for children. See "Shen Yu".
swaddling clothes
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　襁; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 937 No. 10
【Tang Yun】juice two cuts 【Jiyun】【Classes】【Rhyme Meeting】Cut two cuts 【zhengyun】juice cut,? 【Said the text】Sorry class also.　[Jade articles] Qian Guan also. [Previous Han·Shihuo Zhi] Zang Bao tens of millions. [Guang Yun] Vulgar made 镪.　[Jiyun] is the same as the baby. 【Historical Records·Biography of General Wei】Tianzi was in swaddling. [Note] The swaddle is two inches long and eight inches wide, so as to fit a child on the back.　[Guang Yun] Swaddled silk is full.
